Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static uint32_t MIBSPI_checkTGComplete ( MIBSPIRegs *  ptrMibSpiReg,
uint8_t  group 
)
static

Description
This function checks to see if the transfer for the specified transfer group has finished.

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiRegSPI module base address
[in]groupTransfer group
Return values
=1Transfer is finished. =0 Transfer is not finished.

static void MIBSPI_dataTransfer ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint8_t *  srcData,
uint8_t *  dstData,
uint16_t  dataElemSize,
uint8_t  group 
)
static

Description
This function takes source and destination address and invoke MibSPI to transfer it over DMA/CPU

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver handle
[in]srcDataInput buffer pointer to send the Data from
[in]dstDataOutput buffer pointer to get the Data
[in]dataElemSizeData Elements size
[in]groupMibSPI transfer group used for this transfer
Return values
Successful=0 Failed <0

Return values
None.
static void MIBSPI_enableLoopback ( MIBSPIRegs *  ptrMibSpiReg,
MibSpi_LoopBackType  loopbacktype 
)
static

Description
This function enables the Loopback mode for self test. Loopback is SPI master only feature.

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiRegMibspi module base address
[in]loopbacktypeDigital or Analog
Return values
None.

static uint32_t MIBSPI_readDataRAM ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint8_t  group,
uint16_t *  data,
uint16_t  dataElem 
)
static

Description
This function transfers the data from the specified transfer group receive buffers to the data array, the length of the data must match the length of the transfer group.

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver Handle
[in]groupTransfer group (0..7)
[out]dataPointer to data array
[in]dataElemData element size
Return values
returnerror flags from data buffer, if there was a receive error on one of the buffers this will be reflected in the return value.

uint32_t  desiredSpiClock 
)
static

Description
Change SPI master clock prescaler

Parameters

[in]clockSrcFreqSPI Module source clock frequency
[in]desiredSpiClockDesired SPI clock rate on CLOCK pin
Return values
None
static void MIBSPI_setResetMode ( MIBSPIRegs *  ptrMibSpiReg,
bool  reset 
)
static

Description
This function brings Mibspi module out of reset.

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiRegPointer to the SPI driver Register Base Address
[in]resettrue - mibspi module will be set in reset mode. false - it brings MibSPI out of reset mode.
Return values
None

static int32_t MIBSPI_sysDmaChanDeInit ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint32_t  dmaChan,
uint32_t  dmaReqline 
)
static

Description
This function de-initialize the system DMA

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver handle
[in]dmaChanSystem DMA channel number
[in]dmaReqlineSystem DMA request line
Return values
Successful=0 Failed <0 return error code from system DMA module
static uint32_t MIBSPI_sysDmaChanInit ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint8_t  dmaChan,
uint8_t  dmaReqline,
int32_t *  errCode 
)
static

Description
This function handles the DMA channel initialization for both TX/RX

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver handle
[in]dmaChanSystem DMA channel number
[in]dmaReqlineSystem DMA request line
[out]errCodeError code to be populated by the driver
Return values
SuccessfulSystem DMA channel number Failed DMA_CHANNEL_NONE
static void MIBSPI_sysDmaIntHandler ( uint32_t  dmaChannel,
DMA_IntType  dmaIntType,
void *  arg 
)
static

Description
This function handles the DMA interrupt which is generated due to MibSpi

Parameters
[in]dmaChannelDMA channel
[in]dmaIntTypeDMA interrupt type FTC/BTC
[in]argDMA interrupt argument
Return values
None.
static void MIBSPI_sysDmaSetChanParams ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint32_t  dmaChan,
uint32_t  sAddr,
uint32_t  dAddr,
uint16_t  elemCnt,
uint16_t  frameCnt,
MibSpi_transferType  txRxConfig 
)
static

Description
This function configures system DMA Control packet for data transfer between user buffer and MibSPI RAM

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver Handle
[in]dmaChanDMA channel number
[in]sAddrSource buffer address
[in]dAddrDestination buffer address
[in]elemCntElement count
[in]frameCntFrame count
[in]txRxConfigTx/Rx Config option
Return values
None.
static bool MIBSPI_transfer ( SPI_Handle  handle,
SPI_Transaction *  transaction 
)
static

Description
SPI interface funtion to initiate SPI transaction based on the transaction configuration.

Parameters
[in]handleSPI device handle
[in]transactionTransaction configuration
Return values
trueif transaction is successful false if transaction is failed

static void MIBSPI_writeDataRAM ( MibSpiDriver_Object *  ptrMibSpiDriver,
uint8_t  group,
uint16_t *  data,
uint16_t  dataElem 
)
static

Description
This function updates the data for the specified transfer group, the length of the data must match the length of the transfer group.

Parameters
[in]ptrMibSpiDriverMibSpi driver Handle
[in]groupTransfer group (0..7)
[in]dataData buffer address
[in]dataElemData element size
Return values
